args.admin_text: Really long text, revealing the final connection of the quiz. All/most answers of the entire quiz should appear as {keywords} between brackets in this text. The final candidate first gets to see all these keywords/answers and has to guess what the final connection is before this text reveals it.
args.start_bonus: number: seconds that get added on top of the score at the start. This is how long the player has to guess the connection.
